_comment: Types are: XP, MONEY, MOBCOIN, FISHING, MINE
_comment2: Material can be a string of the material or material id for instance: 160/14 -> red glass pane
_comment3: Time is in milliseconds. This will be translated to a readable time in strings/messages
_comment4: Change is 0 - 100. This determines the chance that the amplifier will take effect.

_messages.booster_end: Your booster: {name} has expired of type {type}
